attributes.action: acknowledge Ice Hockey as a growing sport in the UK and therefore give the appropriate level of support and funding as is given to other sports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ice Hockey in the UK is massively under represented. 
The funding given to Ice Hockey as a sport and Ice facilities in the UK is disgraceful compared to funding of other sports.
Support the GB Ice Hockey set up with funding and facilities adequate to compete on the international stage, and achieve Olympic Qualification.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
